column1: It was his position that the sentence imposed on the appellant was within the
permitted legal parameters of the Penal  Code and cannot be termed  excessive
as claimed on behalf of the appellant.
The  learned  State  Counsel  moved  for  the  dismissal  of  the  appeal  for  want  of
